titles.title: Temporary Federal ESOP Grant Program Act of 2020
Temporary Federal ESOP Grant Program Act of 2020
A bill to establish a grant program to encourage the creation and expansion of employee stock ownership plans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Temporary Federal ESOP Grant Program Act of 2020
This bill establishes a grant program for businesses that establish or expand an employee stock ownership plan that meets the applicable federal requirements for such plans.
